Trump stated that the US would respond forcefully if hangings commence, emphasizing that killing thousands of people would have severe consequences for Iran. He also indicated that the US is monitoring the situation closely and will act accordingly.

description: Revenue authorities in Malappuram have issued a stop memo for preparatory work on the Bharatapuzha River for the Mahamagha Mahotsavam, citing violations of the Kerala River Protection Act. Organizers, however, claim they had obtained necessary permissions and intend to proceed with the event, alleging attempts to disrupt Hindu religious rites.

title: Indore contaminated water crisis: A fortnight later, govt admits 15 deaths
description: The Madhya Pradesh government has grimly confirmed that a diarrhoea outbreak in Indore has led to 15 tragic deaths linked to pollution of drinking water. Findings from a study by Mahatma Gandhi Medical College doctors have sparked further scrutiny into the circumstances surrounding these cases.

Karunanidhi’s remark on Ram Setu, Vishwa Hindu Parishad (VHP) leader and former BJP MP Ram Vilas Vedanti triggered a major controversy in September 2007 by saying that “whosoever chopped off the head and tongue of the DMK president would be gifted in gold.”

description: Despite their nutritional and environmental benefits, people are increasingly moving away from insect-based foods. Urbanisation has created both physical and cultural distance from such practices. Many younger generations that have grown up or settled in cities are often unaware that insects are eaten across several parts of India

'Ready to induct women in infantry if there is societal acceptance': Army chief
description: The Indian Army is prepared to integrate women into infantry roles, contingent on societal readiness, Army Chief General Upendra Dwivedi stated. He emphasized gender neutrality and uniform standards, noting a sequential induction into combat roles. The Army is also undergoing significant modernization, focusing on drone capabilities, advanced weaponry, and self-reliance in ammunition for future warfare.

title: Bengaluru horror: Restaurant security guard smashes puppy to death
description: A young puppy was brutally assaulted and killed in JP Nagar, with CCTV footage showing a man smashing the animal against a wall. Animal welfare volunteers reported the incident, and police are now searching for the accused, identified as Nepal Kiran, who is reportedly absconding.

title: Aaron Rodgers accused of emotional abuse by ex Danica Patrick amid wife mystery
description: Aaron Rodgers' marriage and wife, Brittani, continues to be a mystery even after the two have been reportedly been married for more than half a year. Amid all the mess, Aaron Rodgers' ex, Danica Patrick, has made controversial claims against the NFL veteran about the relationship the two shared for over two years. Aaron Rodgers continues to stay distant from all the drama.

NEET-PG cut-off score now fixed at -40 out of 800
description: Government has significantly reduced NEET-PG cut-offs to fill over 9,000 vacant medical postgraduate seats. Percentiles for general, EWS, SC, ST, and OBC candidates have been lowered, some to zero. This move aims to prevent wastage of training capacity amidst a doctor shortage and follows a plea from the Indian Medical Association.

description: The Kerala High Court has ordered a vigilance probe into alleged misappropriation of over Rs 35 lakh from the sale of leftover ghee at Sabarimala. The court directed the vigilance director to form a team and register a crime based on a report highlighting discrepancies in fund remittance from ghee packet sales. A progress report is due within a month.

title: Explained: How Elon Musk's Starlink became Iran protesters’ lifeline as internet blackout deepens
description: Iran's internet shutdowns during protests are being circumvented by SpaceX's Starlink satellite service. Despite being illegal, terminals enter the country via informal channels, offering a lifeline for communication and information sharing. Authorities attempt to jam signals and locate devices, leading to a constant technological battle, while legal risks for users escalate.

Amazon's RTO gets stricter: Managers tracking hours; three types of employees under scanner
description: Amazon is now closely monitoring office attendance, tracking not just presence but also exact hours spent by corporate employees. This escalation in surveillance, revealed by an internal document, flags 'Low-Time Badgers' and 'Zero Badgers' who don't meet in-office expectations. The move follows a strict five-day return-to-office mandate, with similar tracking systems emerging at tech rivals like Samsung and Dell.

title: Happy Makar Sankranti 2026: Top 70+ wishes, messages, greetings and quotes to share
description: Makar Sankranti, a solar calendar festival, marks the Sun's northward journey, symbolizing change, warmth, and new beginnings. Celebrated across India with various names, it fosters joy and gratitude. The article offers a collection of wishes, messages, and quotes to share, strengthening bonds and spreading positivity during this auspicious occasion.

title: ICE criticism, Iran silence: How Golden Globes exposed Hollywood's hypocrisy
description: Golden Globe attendees wore anti-ICE pins to protest the recent killing of Renee Good by an ICE officer. This political statement contrasted with last year's ceremony, highlighting ongoing protests and calls for accountability. The article questions Hollywood's silence on the protests in Iran, suggesting reasons like "Trump Derangement System" and the complexity of the Iranian narrative.

title: Justin Rose and Kate Phillips net worth timeline from 2016 to 2026
description: Justin Rose and his wife Kate Phillips have built a combined net worth estimated at $50–$60 million by 2026, driven by Rose’s sustained PGA Tour success, endorsements, and long-term investments. Their wealth has grown steadily over a decade, reflecting consistent performance, careful financial planning, and ongoing involvement in business and philanthropy.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe Bryant’s iconic footwork vs Charlotte Hornets
description: Vanessa Bryant continues to honor her late husband, Kobe Bryant, by sharing cherished memories. Recently, she posted a throwback clip of Kobe's incredible 2008 dunk against the Charlotte Hornets, highlighting his 'Mamba Mentality.'  She also expressed gratitude on behalf of the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation for the support enabling opportunities for young athletes.
